column1: #localisation that cannot find a forever home, can find rest and solitude in this humble file. -Domaxs

column2: Find the current Avatar, if there is one revealed.
The Avatar remains concealed from the world...
Perhaps I should get to know them better?
The Avatar is somewhere in this world...
I admire the tenacity of the people of the Earth Kingdom
column3: Je souhaite en savoir plus sur la chrétienté.
column4: Ich möchte mehr über das Christentum lernen.
column6: Deseo saber más sobre el cristianismo.

column2: The piety of the Water Tribes is something to be aspired to.

column2: The people of the Fire Nation weave a fine knit of ferocity and spirituality.

column2: The spiritual lifestyle of the Air Nomads is to be admired.
column3: Les religions orientales sont plus à mon goût.
column4: Die östlichen Religionen sind mehr nach meinem Geschmack.
column6: Las religiones orientales me gustan más.
